title: [Teemo] Rubble pops shrooms

replies.body:
Everything can target debris the moment it appears. Even skill shots, its a huge bug that effects more than teemo
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nLsT3BNZ7mY

> [{quoted}](name=Bergk,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=GaxzBge0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-17T15:24:36.571+0000)
>
> Everything can target debris the moment it appears. Even skill shots, its a huge bug that effects more than teemo
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nLsT3BNZ7mY

Yeah, pretty ridiculous that they didn't test this. Are they seriously just throwing stuff out without prior testing? If the rubble is going to stay there permanently, why  not just make it a non-interactive asset, similar to the animals that run around the map? It's just beyond me why they would have it be interactive to begin with, if it is purely for strategic thought and nothing else

The past few ranked games I've been playing I found that AT LEAST 3 or 4 shrooms get popped solely because of this bug.

@KateyKhaos thanks for your quick response! :)

I just really don't want to see this get swept under the rug until the next patch. If you look at my history, you can see I only play Teemo, and normally I don't really bring up my qualms about the champion, but this is just ruining the game for me. I'd really like to get this fixed or have rubble disabled until it is relatively bug free.
"relatively quick"?  lol they don't spend their entire work day on the boards.  you posted this 3 hours ago...

Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are looking into it.

Great to see patch came out without this being fixed. Really hate how Riot bases priority of fixes on how much competitive attention the champion is receiving.

@Riot KateyKhaos, do you have anything to say to all the Teemo mains who are being hurt by this half-assed implementation of ward rubble?

this will need some serious code fixxing, it's not a copy/paste type fix. I'm guessing it's a parser command for entities that broke somewhere. i think they patched some of it...i know I was able to bubble the rubble on Karma...might have been a minion standing on the rubble...but it seemed for a little while you could bubble the rubble.
Hotfix came and passed...Hopefully they will fix this in the new update.
What is your problem BADxWoLF? You are appalled that players are not satisfied that a gamebreaking bug is allowed to be on the game for 2 weeks?

Yeah I reported this like 5 days again and it also affects other champs =\

and there should be an intern checking the boards for an entire work day, especially if it improves the game overall if a major issue is reported.

This bug also has been reported to Riot, but they haven't announced on fixing it yet or its current progress. Its a reason, I stop playing teemo for the most part.

It's just awesome that they will completely disable a champion for some "gamebreaking" bug that affects less than 1% of the population, and even then only occurs on chance occasions, but will wait several weeks for such a gamebreaking bug that people have stopped playing Teemo all together.

soooo...you want them to disable teemo?  considering your name, i'm pretty sure you would throw a temper tantrum comparative to the one you are now.

your lack of patience is appalling.
